content.question: The location of a point in the plane is given by polar coordinates <math alttext="open parentheses negative 3 comma fraction numerator 2 pi over denominator 3 end fraction close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></math>. Which of the following gives another representation for this point in polar coordinates?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parentheses 3 comma fraction numerator 5 pi over denominator 3 end fraction close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses 3 comma fraction numerator 2 pi over denominator 3 end fraction close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></math>
<math alttext="open parentheses 3 comma pi over 3 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses negative 3 comma fraction numerator 7 pi over denominator 3 end fraction close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>7</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parentheses 3 comma fraction numerator 5 pi over denominator 3 end fraction close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
